name: Car Pro Simulator Racing Game
description:
Welcome to Car Pro Simulator Racing Games! Do you like playing car simulator games? It is one of the best car driving simulator that features more than 18 vehicles and a huge open-world map to explore. A big selection of vehicles is waiting for you: sedans, supercars, off roaders, SUVs and more, with realistic engine sounds and accurate interiors! You can play this car simulator online or offline. Follow the driving rules and take the final test.
If you pass the driving exam, you'll get your licence. In our driving free mode, you can even get out of the car. Take the car on the highway
